Hanford Elementary School District currently employees five (5) full-time School Counselors. School Counselors are trained to help students succeed academically, socially, behaviorally and emotionally.

div.div: Hanford Elementary Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Classes are scheduled to resume on August 11, 2020. The closure of our schools is intended to protect the health of students and staff.

HESD will continue to provide meal service during the closure of our schools. Meals will be served once a week 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches from 11:00 12:30 p.m. at the following HESD schools sites: Lincoln Elementary, MLK Elementary, Monroe Elementary & JFK Junior High. Any child ages 0 18 years of age may get a meal at any of our sites. Children must be present to receive the meals. For a list of the dates meals service pick-up will be available, please see the banner on the front page of our HESD website.

Distance learning is underway for our HESD students and will resume after Spring Break on Tuesday, April 14th. All students in grades 3 8 should have their HESD Acer laptop. If you were not able to pick up your childs laptop please contact the school to set-up an appointment to pick it up. All distance learning materials are located on our webpage and communication will be sent out when new materials are made available.
Once again, please refer to our website at www.hanfordesd.org for updates. Thank you for your continued understanding and support during this time of national crises.
